night_squid.message: Pitch darkness reveals a Night Squid.

sea_guardian.message: You stumbled upon a Sea Guardian.

sea_witch.message: It looks like you've disrupted the Sea Witch's brewing session. Watch out, she's furious!

sea_archer.message: You reeled in a Sea Archer.

rider_of_the_deep.message: The Rider of the Deep has emerged.

carrot_king.message: Is this even a fish? It's the Carrot King!

agarimoo.message: Your Chumcap Bucket trembles, it's an Agarimoo.

guardian_defender.message: You've discovered a Guardian Defender of the sea.

deep_sea_protector.message: You have awoken the Deep Sea Protector, prepare for a battle!

water_hydra.message: The Water Hydra has come to test your strength.

the_sea_emperor.message: The Sea Emperor arises from the depths.

oasis_rabbit.message: An Oasis Rabbit appears from the water.

oasis_sheep.message: An Oasis Sheep appears from the water.

nightmare.message: You hear trotting from beneath the waves, you caught a Nightmare.

werewolf.message: It must be a full moon, a Werewolf appears.

phantom_fisher.message: The spirit of a long lost Phantom Fisher has come to haunt you.

grim_reaper.message: This can't be! The manifestation of death himself!

frozen_steve.message: Frozen Steve fell into the pond long ago, never to resurface...until now!

frosty.message: It's a snowman! He looks harmless.

grinch.message: The Grinch stole Jerry's Gifts...get them back!

nutcracker.message: You found a forgotten Nutcracker laying beneath the ice.

reindrake.message: A Reindrake forms from the depths.

nurse_shark.message: A tiny fin emerges from the water, you've caught a Nurse Shark.

blue_shark.message: You spot a fin as blue as the water it came from, it's a Blue Shark.

tiger_shark.message: A striped beast bounds from the depths, the wild Tiger Shark!

great_white_shark.message: Hide no longer, a Great White Shark has tracked your scent and thirsts for your blood!

flaming_worm.message: A flaming worm surfaces from the depths!

lava_blaze.message: A Lava Blaze has surfaced from the depths!

lava_pigman.message: A Lava Pigman arose from the depths!

magma_slug.message: From beneath the lava appears a Magma Slug.

moogma.message: You hear a faint Moo from the lava... A Moogma appears.

lava_leech.message: A small but fearsome Lava Leech emerges.

pyroclastic_worm.message: You feel the heat radiating as a Pyroclastic Worm surfaces.

lava_flame.message: A Lava Flame flies out from beneath the lava.

fire_eel.message: A Fire Eel slithers out from the depths.

thunder.message: You hear a massive rumble as Thunder emerges.

lord_jawbus.message: You have angered a legendary creature... Lord Jawbus has arrived
